content: @Sean McIlvenna How do I export the error log from Trifolia as a .txt file?
There's not a particular function to do that... I would just copy and paste the logs from the export to a notepad and save it somewhere on your file system.
FYI, I'm on vacation today. Will be back in office tomorrow. Will check back, then.
We tried to export the IG, if that is what you were suggesting, but the error logs are not in the export.
@Monique van Berkum , no, I mean you should "Publish" and then when it's done, copy the logs from the screen to a notepad
Unless you're referring to different errors than I'm thinking of
